hadiths.text: Narrated Zayd ibn Thabit: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: The prayer a man offers in his house is more excellent than his prayer in this mosque of mine except obligatory prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الرَّجُلِ التَّطَوُّعَ فِي بَيْتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A Person's Voluntary Prayer In His House
